attributes.action: Impose new restrictions on political donations and beneficiaries of public funds
attributes.additional_details: The Nolan Principles include openness, accountability, integrity and honesty. We believe the widely perceived link between the award of government contracts and donations to political parties undermines these principles - and that this has been exacerbated by what we see as an erosion of standards in government procurement processes.
attributes.background: We want a ban on individuals who have donated to the party of government benefiting from government contracts for the life of that government, and a ban on political parties receiving donations from individuals or companies that have benefitted from government contracts.
